# landscape_script_attachment (Resource)

Script attachment resource (V2 scripts only).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String, Sensitive) Attachment content (base64 encoded during upload). Not returned by the API; kept in state.
- `filename` (String) Filename for the attachment.
- `script_id` (Number) ID of the script this attachment belongs to.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Attachment identifier (V2 only).
